content: size approx 25 5 cm / 10 tall and 16 5 cm/ 6½ wide at widest point yarn estelle yarns sudz tonal and solids crafting cotton worsted weight 100% cotton 74m / 80yds per 50g ball/skein shade mc mustard q53910 1 skein cc leprechaun q53927 1 skein hook 4 50 mm / g - 7 hook gauge 14 chain = 10 cm / 4 long with 4 50 mm / g - 7 hook gauge is not essential in this pattern with specified yarn quantity you may have enough yarn to make two trivets if above gauge is achieved
